apple_vendor_description: This Apple-designed emoji features two women embracing, one with a neutral skin tone and the other with a rich, dark complexion, symbolizing diverse romantic relationships. A vibrant red heart, rendered with Apple's signature glossy 3D shading and soft rounded edges, floats between them, radiating warmth and affection. The realistic lighting and smooth gradients on their forms and the heart create a tender and loving visual narrative, perfect for expressing deep affection and connection on Apple devices.
